txt.en: Talfadan refuses to leave his farm until after his grazing sheep are brought back so that he may lead them to safety.
You've found the sheep but also spy some Orcs looking to climb the mountain
Speak with Turgon
Defeated Morgul scouts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sent sheep back to the farm ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'[placeholder], that sounds like quite the endeavour to get that one man to safety. I'm sorry to put you through that trial.\n\n'Well, now that Pelennor is clear of men, we can turn our attention to the offensive.'
Talfadan will now leave the farm for Minas Tirith with his sheep

'It's about time! I might have been able to do that faster myself and on these old legs!\n\n'Eh, you've got spirit, that's for sure. Heh heh! I'll be on my way to the White City then, pointy-eared one.'
'It's about time! I might have been able to do that faster myself and on these old legs!\n\n'Eh, you've got spirit, that's for sure. Heh heh! I'll be on my way to the White City then, bearded one.'
Turgon can be found at the South-gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Turgon.
Talfadan is at Pel DÃºven.\n\nYou should speak with Talfadan.
Speak with Talfadan

'It's about time! I might have been able to do that faster myself and on these old legs!\n\n'Eh, you've got spirit though, that's for sure. Heh heh! I'll be on my way to the White City then, young one.'

'All right, I hate to say this but you've convinced me that I should head over to the White City. There's one last thing that needs to be done though.

'My sheep are out grazing and I can't leave them here. I would never forgive myself if some ruffians got to them!

'Will you go get my sheep and bring them back to the farm so that I may herd them to City?'
Sheep can be found grazing in the south-western corner of Pelennor Fields.\n\nYou should find and return the sheep to Talfadan.
Herd grazing sheep back to the farm ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Morgul scouts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find the area where the sheep are grazing in Pelennor
A Continued Stubbornness
Sheep and Morgul Scouts can be found grazing in the south-western corner of Pelennor Fields.\n\nYou should find and return the sheep to Talfadan as well as defeat the Morgul Scouts.
